attributes.action: Hold a 2nd EU Referendum requiring a majority vote of the registered electorate.
attributes.additional_details:
Professor Nigel Foster FRSA
Professor EU and International Law.
attributes.background: The recent EU referendum result to leave represented far less than half of the UK registered electorate. The consequences are far too important to accept it without a further test of public opinion. It risks splitting the UK as well loss of opportunity for generations to come.
